title: Systematic Corruption: Abu Dhabi $2 Billion Crypto Commitment: Sovereign Wealth Corruption (2025)
summary: Phase 3 analysis of Abu Dhabi $2 Billion Crypto Commitment: Sovereign Wealth Corruption (2025) revealing systematic coordination patterns and institutional capture mechanisms that undermine democratic governance through coordinated private-government networks.
